segments.text: Among all the assistants , I think you're on top of it . Based on the annual evaluation , the board of directors decided to give you a bonus .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I've been reviewing your work over the past few months . Thanks to your excellent work , we benefit much from your project . And you should get the perfect attendance award too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks for your trust . Owing to my colleagues ' help , I've successfully completed my task .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are very modest and diligent . The distribution of bonus derived from the performance evaluation . You deserve it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you very much . I will redouble my efforts in the future .
segments.speaker: S2
